name: Caveman Jewels
description:
Description
In this fun adventure game, ancient land is plagued with dozens of meteors falling from the sky and destroying the land but transforming into expensive gems. The cavemen loved the way the gems looked and decided to risk their lives in pursuit of collecting these gems. Help them collect as many gems as possible

FEATURES

- Addictive and funny gameplay!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Games is filled with unique and fun, amazing challenges!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy game to play and understand with a great interface. Tap the screen to change direction

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play at your own pace.
- Play in anytime and anywhere!

• NO INTERNET CONNECTIONS NEEDED TO PLAY!
- Game can be played offline.

NOTES
• Caveman Jewels contains interstitial and video ads.
• Caveman Jewels is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items such as gems that can be used to unlock other characters

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices such as phones and tablets

E-MAIL
• info@sympogames.com

HOMEPAGE
